description.@en: I can’t hold this here musket up for too long, else I’d drop it. I also cannot draw the bowstring back like when I was a young ’un.

data.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: You cannot take advantage of Extreme or Long Distances with ranged weapons.
